taxon_name.authority: (Engelmann) F. A. C. Weber ex Britton & Rose

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Cactaceae;subfamily Cactoideae;genus Epithelantha;species micromeris;variety micromeris;

bio:treatment.discussion: Epithelantha micromeris var. micromeris has the smallest flowers of any cactus species in the flora. Unlike other taxa in this genus, it is autogamous. No hybrids with E. bokei have been found. The spines of var. var. micromeris are never as strongly appressed as on E. bokei except on sexually immature plants less than 15 mm in diameter; those immature plants have the fewest spines.
